檛字的基本解释

檛
zhuā
马鞭：“吏士寂如水，萧萧闻马檛。”
打：“生到葭萌，与吏争度，津吏檛破从者头。”
笙两侧的管子：“修檛内辟，馀箫外逶”。

檛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuā］
［《廣韻》陟瓜切，平麻，知。］
(1)马鞭子。
(2)古代兵器的一种。
(3)打，敲击。
(4)笙两侧的管子。

檛字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檛； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第10
【唐韻】陟瓜切【集韻】【韻會】張瓜切【正韻】職瓜切，?音撾。箠也。【玉篇】策也。【左傳·文十三年】乃行，繞朝贈之以策。【杜註】策馬檛也。左作簻，又別作?。　又【集韻】莊華切，音髽。義同。

考證：〔【左傳·文十一年】士會適晉繞朝贈之以策。〕　謹照原文十一年改為十三年。士會適晉四字改乃行二字。
檛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檛字的起名意思

暂无。

To
Basic explanation of words
To
zhuā
Horse whip: "The official is as silent as water, Xiao Xiao hears the horse."
Beat: "When you are born to Jiameng, you will compete with the officials, and the officials will break the head of the follower."
The pipes on both sides of the sheng: "Xiu Xiao internally, Yu Xiao externally".
To
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhuā]
["Guangyun" Zhigua cut, plain hemp, know. ]
(1) Horse whip.
(2) A kind of ancient weapon.
(3) Hit, knock.
(4) The pipes on both sides of the Sheng.
To
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檛; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 No. 10
【Tang Yun】Zhi Melon Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhang Melon Cut [Zheng Yun] Professional Melon Cut,? Sounds Laos. Niu also. [Jade articles] Policy also. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Thirteen Years] It's OK, and it's a strategy around the court. 【Du Note】Take a horse. Zuo Zuozhu, don't do it again.　[Jiyun] Zhuang Huaqie, sound 髽. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Wen eleven years] Shihui is suitable for the Jin Dynasty to give a policy. 〕　I would like to change from 11 years to 13 years according to the original text. Shihuishi changed the four-character Jin to the two-character line.

Name meaning
Nothing.
zhuā
сущ.
1) кнут, бич; кнутовище
壮士执檛随之 здоровый мужчина, держа плеть, шёл за ним следом
2) трубка шэна (свирели)
